greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rectangular array:  R(n,k)=[n/F(1)]+[n/F(2)]+...+[n/F(k)], where [ ]=floor and F=A000045 (Fibonacci numbers), by antidiagonals.
comment: For n>=1, row n is a homogeneous linear recurrence sequence with palindromic recurrence coefficients in the sense described at A211701.  The sequence approached as a limit of the rows is described in the Comments section of A175346.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 19 2012
